snippet.title: Game Pill | Get ready to GET SMASHED!
snippet.description:
We invite you to test Smash Ball today! Smash Ball is a fast-paced, hard-hitting competitive sport where you claim victory by any means necessary. In 1v1 or 2v2 matches, attempt to outscore your opponent or utilize a weaponized ball to take them out! Grow your fanbase, manage your team, and enter online tournaments to claim glory!

Download the demo today:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/905360/Smash_Ball/



⥪ Follow us on Social Media ⥭

⇛ Twitter - https://twitter.com/gamepill
⇛ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/gamepill/
⇛ TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@smashballgame?
⇛ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/gamepillofficial/

⥪ For Business Inquiries ⥭

⇛ Website - https://gamepill.com/
⇛ Business Dev - mike@gamepill.com
⇛ Careers - mary@gamepill.com
⇛ Call us! - (416) 857-4821
